markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Skeletal Hulk](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3197)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Huge giants and other enormous creatures make powerful skeletons.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)): DC 23

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 7">[Skeletal Hulk](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3197)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=652" />
<trait label="Skeleton" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=772" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=722" />
<trait label="Unholy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=521" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 313 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +16; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +20, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +15

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +7

**Dex** +2

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 25 

**Fort** +15 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +13 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 105
([void healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=83))

</row>

**Immunities**
bleed, [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=95)

**Resistances**
[cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=555) 5, [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=586) 5, [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604) 5, piercing 5, slashing 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +18 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d6+11 slashing

**Broad Swipe** <actions string="Two Actions" />  As skeletal giant, but with its claw Strike.

**Massive Rush** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The hulk Strides and makes a claw Strike with a +4 circumstance bonus to damage. If the Strike hits, the hulk automatically [pushes](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) the target 10 feet.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-472" />
name: Skeletal Hulk
